ocean.question: I am big and blue and fishies like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 Boats like to sail on me.
🐬 Whales and dolphins live in me.
🐠 I am made of water.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am not very fast.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🖤 I can squirt ink.
🪨 I like to hide in caves.

ocean.question: I am a fish with very sharp teeth. Be careful swimming near me!

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 My teeth are very scary.
🌊 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in a sea anemone.

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and orange with white stripes.
🏠 I live with a plant that stings other fish but not me.
🎬 You might know me from a movie!

ocean.question: I am a very large whale that sings songs in the ocean.

hints.text: 🐳 I am one of the biggest animals in the world!
🎶 I make beautiful sounds in the water.
🌊 I have baleen plates instead of teeth.

ocean.question: I'm a creature shaped like a star and can grow back my arms if they break off.

hints.text: 🌟 I have five arms, sometimes more!
✨ I can regenerate!
🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean and eat clams.

ocean.question: I am a tiny sea animal that builds a hard shell around myself, and many of my friends create reefs.

hints.text: 🧱 I help build big structures under the sea.
💧 I live in colonies.
🐚 I look like a little rock when I am alive.

ocean.question: I am a very small animal that drifts in the ocean and am eaten by many larger animals, I am at the base of the ocean food chain.

hints.text: 🔬 You need a microscope to see me clearly.
🌱 I am like the grass of the ocean.
🐳 Whales love to eat me.

ocean.question: I am a strong current that moves warm water from near the equator towards the North Atlantic.

hints.text: 🌡️ I affect the weather in Europe.
➡️ I am like a river in the ocean.
🌊 I start near Florida.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange and crunchy!
🌱 I grow under the ground.
🐇 Rabbits love to eat me!

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift.
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me.
🌸 I come in many colors!

plant.question: I am big and tall, and birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can climb me.
🍂 I have leaves that fall in autumn.
🐿️ Squirrels like to live in me.

plant.question: I have prickly points and grow in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can store water for a long time.
🏜️ I like hot and dry places.
🩹 Be careful not to poke yourself on my spikes!

plant.question: I grow in water and have big, flat leaves. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Ribbit! A friend likes me.
🏞️ I float on a pond or lake.
💧 My leaves are very broad.

plant.question: I have a long, bendy stem and climb on walls and fences. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I wrap myself around things.
🪴 You can grow me up a trellis.
🌿 My stem isn't very strong on its own.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a tasty treat when heated. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You eat me at the movies!
🔥 I need heat to transform.
🌽 I come from a yellow plant.

plant.question: I'm a plant with a long stalk and a fluffy white head. You can make a wish when you blow on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 Blow on me and my seeds will fly!
🌼 I'm yellow when I am younger.
🌾 My seeds float in the wind.

plant.question: I'm a big fruit that grows on a vine, and I'm often pink or red inside with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 You can spit out my seeds.
☀️ I'm a summer treat.
🟢 I have a thick green rind.

plant.question: I have a trunk and branches, but I don't have leaves all year. I lose them in the fall. What kind of tree am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves change color before they fall.
🐻 Animals might hibernate near me.
🥶 I survive cold winters without my leaves.
